summary: Deshu, a mechanic from Dubai, comes home to Mumbai, and gets embroiled in a crime by accident. The film shows his meteoric rise from common, law-abiding man to underworld kingpin.
cast: Randeep Hooda|Chunky Pandey|Rukhsar Rehman|Isha Koppikar|Yashpal Sharma|Sushant Singh|Goga Kapoor|Ishrat Ali|Raj Arjun|Nagesh Bhonsle|Vrajesh Hirjee|Zaheed Hurrain|Zakir Hussain|Narayan Jadhav|Vinod Jaywant|Jeeva|Pankaj Jha|Murari Kumar|Dinesh Lamba|Pawan Mahendru|Raju Mavani|Gufi Paintal|Ajai Rohilla|Jaspal Sandhu|Vikas Sharma|Vikas Sharma|Deepak Shirke|Joginder Singh|Shailen Srivastav|Vivek Srivastav|Murari Thakur|Rajpal Yadav
title: 'D'
